subject: fix: add missing CSS import to main.jsx — fixes PWA white screen
body:
The React migration removed <link rel="stylesheet" href="./styles.css">
from index.html but never added the equivalent JS import in main.jsx.
The build produced zero CSS files, causing white text on white background.

https://claude.ai/code/session_01PDHt8q4AsuqeBkuofa65pr
title: add missing CSS import to main.jsx — fixes PWA white screen
